src.storage.config package¶

Submodules¶

src.storage.config.FileManagerConfigurator module¶

Module used for factory method existent in FileManagerConfigurator. Module contains the factory class that should not be instantiated.

class src.storage.config.FileManagerConfigurator.FileManagerConfigurator[source]¶

Bases: object

Class used as factory for file managers based on storage types passed.

Methods¶

get_managers(conn_strings: tuple[str], storage_types: tuple[StorageType])

Instantiates the managers based on storage types

static get_managers(conn_strings: tuple[str], storage_types: tuple[src.validations.ArgsValidator.StorageType]) → tuple[source]¶

Instantiates the managers accordingly to storage types

Parameters¶

conn_stringstuple

The connection strings necessary for each storage type. Must be valid conn_strings, usually validated before used here

storage_typestuple

The storage types identified by parsing the conn_strings by Validator.

Module contents¶

Package for factories of FileManager implementations. Currently, containing only FileManagerConfigurator and instantiating managers based on string args (usually parsed command-line args) and their internal representation mapped using the pattern that every string respects
